text: PAN ACROSS the frightened faces of NINE WITNESSES, eyes f straight ahead.  A POLICE OFFICER walks slowly past each FOOTSTEPS ECHOING in their fear.
Take your time.  Take a good look. He passes a nervous SAFEWAY CASHIER in uniform.
Ah, a-are you sure they can't see us?
Two-way mirror, ma'am. He passes a UNIFORMED CHEERLEADER, an OLDER WOMAN, then a FACTORY WORKER, who removes his "Lincoln, Local 186" cap wipes his nervous brow.
But they're trained killers.  A guy at the plant says, "In 'Nam they could smell ya!"
This is the United States of America, Sir. Officer reaches the end of the line - presses an intercom
(into intercom) Face front. Witnesses react - GASP - avert their eyes!

The source of their fear - FIVE UNIFORMED CHEERLEADERS against the suspect wall.  They look like deer caught in headlights.  A sixth cheerleader, DIAN WESTON, is helped up the steps. One thing separates her from the rest - SHE'S SIX MONTHS PREGNANT.
(friendly, to female officer) I'm sorry to bother you, ma'am, but is this going to take long?  It's game night.
(on intercom) Picture in three -- Like saying "walk" to a dog, the girls instantly smile.
(on intercom) -- two, one...
FLASH WHITE to INDIVIDUAL MUG SHOTS (with CREDITS) over LINCOLN HIGH SCHOOL SONG.
A LIGHT hanging above a table.
...a heinous crime has been committed here...

CAMERA TRACKS EYE LEVEL around the table where an FBI AGE (mid-40's, black suit), sits across from LISA JANUSCH (cheerleader from the witness side) - pretty, in a man-ma way - bitchy in a B-squad Cheerleader way.  Other black suited AGENTS stand in the room.  CHEERLEADER MUG SHOTS c the table.
...and testifying in such a case is a serious matter.  Should you decide your testimony would jeopardize your personal safety.
Look, "Sipowitz", I said I'd tell you everything - I was just hoping to finish up before menopause kicks in. She smiles sweetly to the agent, then pushes Diane's MUG toward him.
(dropping smile) Let's start with the one who thinks her shit don't stink.  Diane Weston.
Foggy, heart-shaped mirror.
She's like a goddamn poster child for high school. A HAND ENTERS FRAME and WIPES CLEAR the mirror, REVEALING DIANE (pregnant cheerleader in opening - not pregnant now
(to self in mirror) Morning, sunshine.  Remember, these are the best days of your life. She starts to leave - then comes back.
-- so far! She bucks her chin in the mirror and smiles - she's beyon adorable.
If I wasn't such a lady, I'd tell you what a bitch she really is.
Sign reads "CHEERLEADING TRYOUTS."  PAN DOWN a long line HOPEFUL GIRLS.
She's the A-squad captain - stole the title from me.  You should charge her with that...

Diane, pompoms on hips, smiles toward the camera.  A SIGN the floor in front of her reads: "SQUAD MEMBER."  A SIGN her left reads: "CHALLENGER". BRUCE, an effeminate young man, bounds up behind the "CHALLENGER" sign - putting his pompoms on hips.
Hey, Bruce!  You look cute...
(off clothes) Tommy Hilfiger.  I'm hoping fourth year's a charm. He crosses his fingers and arms.  Diane smiles.  LISA run frame and SHOVES Bruce to the ground.
Outta my way, fag.  I'm up. Humiliated, Bruce RUNS O.S.  Lisa takes his place, looks straight ahead and smiles, pompoms on hips.
This really should have been my year.  I had a lotta work done - I-I mean, y'know, I'd done a lotta work over the summer. Diane can't take her eyes off Lisa.
Lisa?...  Is-is that you? LISA'S STUDENT I.D. drops INTO FRAME - her nose is big, s has no chin.
(looks straight ahead) I lost a little weight.
You could tell it made her nervous. Diane shakes her head in disbelief and turns forward.
Ready? (pompoms snap to waist) Okay! POMPOMS SNAP TO THIGHS and the CHEER BEGINS.   Diane is effortless as she glides, jumps and smiles throu it - clearly better than Lisa.
But they have to, y'know, spread the talent around, so I've been on the B squad for four years.
Lisa pushes the rest of the mug shots toward the FBI agen
Now, the squad as a whole?  They're closer than Carolina cousins.  Some people say they're, like, lezbos or something.  But that's mostly just the yag-offs in band...
FIVE PAIR of LEGS with MATCHING ANKLETS and WHITE KEDS da from the stalls.

...truth is, they're so close - they all get their monthly visit from "Aunt Rose" at the same time. A HAND REACHES UNDER the first stall, PASSING A BOX OF TAMPONS to the next stall - and so on down the line.
First, there's Hannah Wold...
HANNAH WOLD, a large, pretty girl in uniform, exits and crosses to the mirror.
She's their base.  Strong as an ox.  She's like this Uber-Christian - doesn't say much.  I mean, if she wasn't kinda pretty, you'd go, "Hey, who's the tard?"
CLEO MILLE, pretty, starlet-type, wears plenty of make-up She lifts the front of her uniform sweater, holds it with teeth.
Then, there's Cleo Miller... She opens her purse, pulls out a gel breast and stuffs it one cup of her bra.
Number one - not a natural blonde. She REPEATS for the other breast, then pulls her sweater down.

I know.  I've been in the locker room and seen south of the border.  Number two -- (whispers) She has to see the school shrink. Cleo lifts the back of her skirt - REVEALING CONAN O'BRIE face SILKSCREENED on her underpants (thought bubble above head reads "Friday... I love Cleo.").  She KISSES HER HAN and plants it on his/her cheek.
Cleo sits in front of the SCHOOL COUNSELOR.

Dreams?  You mean, like, where I'm in Conan's all leather apartment - I don't know if he has one, that's why it's a dream - and suddenly we're buck-naked and all oiled up.  I don't know where the oil comes from - again, that's why it's a dream.
Next STALL DOOR SHAKES, but DOESN'T OPEN.
Cleo's weird, but Kansas Hill - that girl's crazy. HANDS APPEAR on top of the stall door - and KANSAS HILL, petite, cute in a trashy, monster-truck-pull, kinda way - CRAWLS UNDER.
Son-of-a-blue-balled-bitch!  I always get this one.
Mouth on her that could stop a bull in heat.  Gets her nut-brain from her mom.  See, Mrs. Hill's been in prison since the day Kansas was born...
MRS. HILL'S blurry POV - from her hospital bed.
She was lying there, in labor with Kansas, when she sees something going on in the next bed. Mrs. Hill's POV PANS LEFT - NEXT BED comes into focus.
Turns out it's Kansas' dad, uh, taking a nurse's temp.  Stay with me, I'm trying to be delicate.
In silhouette, a MAN is FUCKING a NURSE.
So, Mrs. Hill whips out a shotgun and blows his ass to kingdom come. We see this - still in MRS. HILL'S POV.
Jury said, because the majority of women in Lincoln County having babies don't bring a shotgun, it counted as premeditation.
She got life without parole, so Kansas lives with her grandparents. The next stall door opens and LUCY - cute, smart, very ti EXITS, suddenly stopping to look down.
Then there's Lucy... She takes out a WHITE-OUT BOTTLE and touches a spot on he already white Keds... stands... looks... then touches a s on the other shoe...

Geek extraordinaire - a walking left brain.  She's supposed to have this genius I.Q.? She then starts an obsessional frenzy of "whiting out" sp all over her Keds.  DIANE exits the final stall and takes away Lucy's white-out.
Truth is, she's an obsessive-compulsive little freak.
Hands in, ladies. Squad joins Diane in a circle, putting their hands over h hand - a la Madonna, backstage.
Today, we're going to cheer loud, jump high, and look pretty because --
IN ONE BEAT, ALL SWING RIGHT ARMS OVER HEAD, landing with SMACK on the "ASS" of the girl to their right.
Now let's get going - because nobody ever got ahead by sitting on their behind! As all run out, we:

PRINCIPAL SMITH, a man who burned out long ago, stands be a microphone on a small stage as he's done for 45 years.  The LINCOLN HIGH "FIGHTIN' LOG" MASCOT (looks like an ang Tootsie Roll with legs and overly muscular arms) stands beside him, pantomiming everything he says.  STUDENTS fil bleachers on either side.
The school year started off like normal.  Principal Smith gave his pep talk --

(reading from a list) ... and if you are approached to buy drugs, let someone you trust know.  If you are thinking of harming yourself or others, let someone know.  If it burns when you urinate, have milky seepage or are being touched by an uncle - let someone know... Mascot looks at him, tries to pantomime.

The A-squad performed... GYM LIGHTS GO DARK.  STUDENTS SCREAM.  DRUM CORP. and BRA BAND start "ROCK & ROLL PART II" by Gary Glitter. The SPOTLIGHT RACES around the gym before it hits center court.  The A-squad springs to their feet for an amazing cheer/dance - strong, sexy, acrobatic, non-traditional.

Now, I know it's my duty to give you all the facts, so I have to say that their cheer blew like a bulimic after Christmas dinner.  Their blatant disregard for National High School Cheerleading Association rules made me sick.  "Basket toss flips and wolf wall pyramids over two people high are strictly prohibited."  I made a complete report and sent it in.
Outside the gym doors.
And finally, the football team was introduced.
Transferring from Truman High, the new star quarter back of our mighty Fightin' Logs!

That's when Jack and Diane met.  Nobody saw it coming... CAMERA TURNS, PLAYERS head-butt and high-five CAMERA/Jack he starts through the door - looking around gym.  SLOW MO FREEZE-FRAME as the SPOTLIGHT HITS CAMERA/Jack.

Especially not Jack... SOUND DISTORTS.  It's LOUD and CONFUSING.  THROUGH IT, we the A-squad running and doing back flips toward CAMERA/Ja As the squad nears CAMERA/Jack, SUDDENLY Diane's Ked-clad foot comes INTO FRAME and SMASHES INTO CAMERA/Jack.

He fell for her hard. IRIS OPEN.  DIANE hovers over CAMERA/Jack, apologizing, looking angelic.  A-squad surrounds her.  Suddenly a fran mascot breaks through, tips his log head back - IT'S BRUC (from try-outs) - mouthing "NOOOOOO!"  He pulls CAMERA/Ja UP.
Mascot/Bruce as he drags his prize quarterback out of the gym.  Jack and Diane's eyes never separate.
Jack was fine - oh man, was he fine.  It was like he was a bar of chocolate and the whole school was on the rag - everyone wanted a piece of him...
Diane's mouth.
Jack Bartlett... Jack Bart-lett... Jack Bar-t-lett. She continues as we PULL BACK to REVEAL we're:

It's an early 80's dream.  The squad sits on their sleepi bags, in a circle, on the floor.  They're painting nails, giving henna tattoos, streaking hair, etc.  Hannah has a OUIJA BOARD in front of her, hands resting on the "MESSAG INDICATOR."  Diane has her eyes closed.
... Ja-ck B-ar-t-le-tt... Is Jack Bartlett interested in me?
(nervous) I-I'm sorry - can someone else please run the Ouija board?  It's creepy, it's wrong and it goes against the teachings of my Lord and Savior, Jesus Christ.
Hannah, in order to get real answers from the netherworld, you've gotta have a Christian virgin run the board.  Your kind is pure of heart - the devil won't dick with you.
(looking down) Well technically, I don't think I'm a virgin anymore. Squad REACTS!
Yeah.  This summer at church camp?  I'm pretty sure I had, y'know, an orgasm.
Hold up, hold up.  Any sentence that starts with "at church camp" ain't leading to the big "O."
That's not true.  Those pictures of Christ - all sweaty and bare-chested on the cross - always kinda made me hot. Squad just stares at her.
Anyway, last time I checked, you still had to have sex to have an orgasm.  And I know she ain't seen the lord on all fours - so I'm just saying.
Well, I want to know what happened --
Okay, one night, around sunset, I went horseback riding with the nuns.  They went every night.  And, well, we're trotting pretty hard, y'know?  The hard leather saddle, pounding between my legs...
I just got a little squishy...
All of a sudden, I feel... I feel... I feel just super alive... (whispering) "down there."  I swear I thought it was the second coming.
Nope.  Sounds more like the first.
(taking the hand-piece) I'll just ask the question myself... "Is Jack Bartlett interested in me?" As the hand-piece starts to move on the board, we:
Jack (with a red Ked print on his cheek) stands with THRE FOOTBALL PLAYERS looking under the hood of his '75 GTO.  They've all got one hand in back pocket, the other wrappe around a beer.
You do the bondo yourself?
Yeah.
Sure-is-sweet.
What'll she do?
Never opened her up.
S-weet.
Who was the girl who kicked me in the head yesterday?
Diane Weston.
Now she sure is sweet.
SIGN hangs above the stage.  "HOMECOMING KING AND QUEEN CANDIDATES."  A row of STUDENT CANDIDATES, including Jack Diane and Lisa, sit behind a BUTCH GIRL at the podium.

Look, I'll be honest with you.  Most of us realized we didn't have a whore's chance in heaven with Jack the day of candidate speeches. As the Butch Girl concludes her speech, she holds a sign her head which reads, "4-H - A WAY OF LIFE!"
A GEEKY GUY stands at the podium.
As the A.V. Club candidate, I think, for the first time in fifty years, we should say -- (nervous) NO to a football player as king! Two HIGH-PITCHED MALE VOICES cheer O.S.
Vote brains over braun! A FOOTBALL flies INTO FRAME, hitting Geeky Guy on the FOREHEAD.
Jack stands at the podium, unable to speak because the CR IS CHEERING!  He's handsome as hell, sweet and genuine. can't help but love him and you really want to fuck him.
It was the first time most of us even heard Jack speak.
Whoa...Thanks, uh - WOW.  Uh, hey, alright...okay, uh --
We weren't disappointed.
Guys!  Hey, guys!  Shut up a minute. The crowd QUIETS down.
Well, uh, I think it just really rocks that the football team picked me as their, y'know, uh, candidate. FOOTBALL PLAYERS AD-LIB "Yeah!  Whoa  Kick ass!"
We love you, Jack!
Hey, well, I love you lunch ladies! Audience LAUGHS.
I just want to say that there are only three things I want in life - to someday become a senator of this great state... Audience CHEERS.
I want to lead the Lincoln High Fightin' Logs to victory at the homecoming game -- Audience CHEERS!

Okay, okay... Uh, and I... I want to go to the homecoming dance with Diane Weston. STUNNED SILENCE.  Diane stares at him.  Lisa looks pissed The school SUDDENLY ERUPTS with CHEERS!  Jack turns to Di She runs up to the podium.  They hug and kiss.
Ucht!  They were like friggin' Barbie and Ken, but without the pink, remote control Corvette.  Overnight people were going, like --
Average GIRL faces CAMERA - MOUTHING:
"Oh, they're the perfect couple!"
ANOTHER average GIRL faces CAMERA - MOUTHING:
"They're so cuuuuuuuuute!"
Geeky Guy sits alone, typing frantically at his computer, stopping occasionally to push up his glasses.
I'm sure it gave the internet whacks something to talk about besides Agent Scully and their most recent wet dream.
Jack and Diane are still in a love-lock.
Now, I'm not one to gossip, but I think Jack and Diane got so close so fast because they discovered how much they both loved...
Janitorial Closet Door.  An excited Diane and Jack meet i front of it, kiss and roll into the closet.
A CLIMBING ROPE hangs in the middle of the shot.  Suddenl disheveled Jack slides down.  A beat later, Diane follows They kiss and part ways - dropping hands at the last minu
Door.  Red-faced Jack and Diane peek out, look to see the alone, kiss good-bye, then head off in opposite direction DOOR CLOSES to reveal a sign "Principal Smith."

It's COLD and LOUD.  Starting on his own 10 YARD LINE, Ja takes the hike, looks left, right - pumps once - twice - NOTHING.  He bursts through the line, dodging - weaving - leaping over his opponents.
15 seconds...
holding their breath, pompons at the ready.  Mascot runs them, pantomiming "nervous" to the crowd by biting his na and knocking his knees.
as he reaches the line of scrimmage.  There's ONE DEFENDE LEFT.  Jack fakes left, right - takes the tackle - but manages to roll out of it!  HE-COULD-GO-ALL-THE...
They're going wild!
running along the sideline - Diane leading the way!
he looks right - sees Diane and mouths "I love you!"
Diane mouths "I love you!"

Jack makes the touchdown, spikes the ball, and starts a s run toward us - arms outstretched.  WE run toward him in MOTION.  SUDDENLY a WALL OF PLAYERS enter frame and tackl him in celebration. END MUSIC.
Now, right about here's where the real shit started to hit the fan... Don't worry - I'll clean this up a bit if I have to appear in court -- especially if we're on "Court TV."
DENNIS WESTON (Diane's Dad) opens the door while DEEDEE (Diane's Mom) FLASHES a PHOTO of a surprised Jack and his parents.
Well, there's a Christmas card.
Come in, come in... All enter the FOYER.  Jack looks gorgeous in his tux.  Hi parents are just like Diane's - mid-40's housewife and mi management drone.  Their children are their lives.
Say Jack, why don't you go light a fire under Diane.
I'm on it, Mr. Weston. Jack smiles and bounds up the stairs - two at a time.

Oh - say, where're my manners.  I'm DeeDee - you can remember me because of my double "D's." She LAUGHS with Dennis as if it's the first time she's sa it.  We see where Diane gets her perk - and her body.
And I'm Diane's Dad, Dennis.  Do not try that after one of my Screwdrivers! Dennis and DeeDee LAUGH again.
(recovering) Whoooo - now who wants some pigs-in-a blanket?
Vanity mirror.  Diane is putting on lip gloss - she looks beautiful in her gown.  We see JACK ENTER in the b.g.  Sh turns.  He reacts to her beauty.
Hi, Jack.
Excuse me, Vendela, have you seen Diane?  We're supposed to go to the homecoming dance tonight. Diane LAUGHS.  They move in for a hormonally driven kiss.
All are seated.  The women are enjoying pigs-in-a-blanket while the men suck back screwdrivers.
I obviously wasn't there the night they all met, but it was probably a super goober fest. DeeDee enthusiastically MOUTHS the following:
(mocking DeeDee's voice) "Your Jack's one heck of a good football player." Jack's Dad MOUTHS the following:
(mocking Jack's Dad's voice) "I don't know how he can concentrate with your lovely Diane cheering on the sidelines?!" They all LAUGH.
"Ha, ha, ha, ha..." Ucht! Jack and Diane enter the holding hands.  DeeDee goes craz FLASHING PHOTOS.  All AD-LIB adoration.
Hold on a minute.  Hold on.  I have an announcement. Jack puts his arm around Diane - they're beaming.
Me and Diane, uh... we decided we're going to get married. The parents react with shock, then absolute joy!  DeeDee starts to cry - turning the CAMERA on HERSELF.
Oh, oh, mother of the bride - I'm allowed!
But not before... I have our baby. All FREEZE - the calm before the shit storm.  Suddenly, Jack's Mom throws her head back and lets out a BLOOD CURD SCREAM.
PULL BACK to REVEAL we're:
... so when your dad said, "I never want to see your "f-'in' faces again!" do you think he meant forever or just until your mom wakes up?
I don't know... And what the hell was that sound she made right before she hit the coffee table.

Well, if I had to guess... (convincing self) I'd say that was the sound of a mother saying good-bye to her little boy and hello to a young man who's going to be a daddy of his own... (getting an idea, cradling his face) Jack, do you know what I see here?
Spit from your dad?
(wiping his hair) I see a flower.  And y'know, even the most beautiful flowers still grow from dirt.
Yeah.
So, while we're knee deep in right now - and things seem pretty "stinky" - in the long run, we're going to grow strong from this.
Y'think?
I sure do. BEAT.
(trust and love in his eyes) Diane, I've loved you ever since I first saw you -- right before you kicked me in the head.
(touched) Oh, Jack... As they move in for a kiss, we:

head_text.subj: A SEA OF BALLOONS FLOATING UP THROUGH FRAME. LOUD MUSIC

text: Jack and Diane are on stage, wearing crowns and large vel robes - they turn and wave!  They won!  They appear to be floating on a sea of balloons.

head_text.subj: A SEA OF BALLOONS FLOATING DOWN THROUGH FRAME.

text: FIVE PAIR of LEGS with HIGH HEELS dangle from the STALLS. (We've seen this shot before.)  MUSIC from the dance pres through the walls.  A HAND REACHES UNDER the first stall, PASSING A BOX OF TAMPONS to the next stall.
Diane must've told her squad that night. BOX OF TAMPONS CONTINUES down the line - UNTIL THE LAST STALL.  Diane's hand comes down and pushes the TAMPONS BA

(in last stall) No thanks - don't need one. FIRST STALL DOOR FILES OPEN, followed by the SECOND, THIR it sticks, Kansas climbs over - and FOURTH!  (Cleo exits fixing her gel breast.)  The squad surrounds Diane's stal door.  She finally exits.
(looking at everyone a beat) So... Stunned silence.
I'm sure they were thrilled.  I mean, if Diane said jump, they'd say "Double Dutch," "Shoot the Moon," or "Split Russian?" Suddenly, everyone starts talking at once.
Holy shit.
You just became a statistic!
(suddenly happy) Oh my G-d!  I'm not first!
But you're not married.
Wait!  Did you say you are pregnant or you were pregnant... You had it, threw it out and you're gonna go back and dance all night!
Shut up, Cleo.  Di, how much do you need for an abortion?

(suddenly freaked) What?!  No!  Not an abortion!  My church can arrange for you to go to Oregon and take care of a "sick aunt" for nine months.  Then they put your baby good home and you come back - a little dazed and puffy - but everything's fine!  Oh please, Di, don't be a whore and a murderer! All FREEZE - no one can believe she just said that.
Jack told the team that night, too.
Jack and a bunch of FOOTBALL PLAYERS in tuxes stand at th urinals, BACKS TO CAMERA.
Hey, guys?  Uh, I got Diane pregnant.
What?!  Well - all right! He HIGH-FIVES Jack with his free hand.

You nailed Diane Weston?  I'd never wash my Johnson again! He HIGH-FIVES Jack on the other side with his free hand a the OTHER FOOTBALL PLAYERS also HIGH-FIVE each other.  Th all freak out when they realize they are touching each ot while PEEING.
All still stare at Hannah
I-I didn't mean to say "whore," Diane.  I just hear it so much at church - it kinda came flying out of my head.

I know, Hannah.  Look, I'm not going to get an abortion.  I mean, I always planned to get married and have kids - I'm just going a little out of order.  Kinda reminds me of another young lady who found herself "with child," unmarried, on a long road, with no place to sleep.  'Course, that was a long-long time ago.  But no matter what, she held her head high and said... "Pappa don't preach, I'm in trouble deep.  Pappa don't preach, 'cause I'm keepin' my baby.  Hey.  I'm gonna keep my baby."  The great one... All take hands and lower their heads.
(with reverence) Madonna.
We're here for you, Diane. All move in to hug her.
I guess their little fairy tale could've ended there, "And they lived happily ever after."  Only problem was... (with great joy, laughing) they didn't have a place to live!
Jack and Diane sit in front of an older LOAN OFFICER'S de SIGN READS: "Your home for home loans."  Loan officer loo over papers as Jack and Diane look excitedly at one anoth Diane takes Jack's hand.
I'm sorry.
What?!  But all our paperwork's there.  My school records, Jack's football records...
Let me explain something...
No.  Wait!  Did I say Promise!  Cross-my heart and hope-to-die, stick-a-needle-in my-eye we'll never miss a payment?!
Uh, yes.  Yes you did.
Diane.  Hold on a minute.  I think I know where this is going. (sotto, to loan officer) I'm willing to put up the papers for my Mustang - she's got a few miles on her, but she looks great.
I'm sure, son, but --
Okay!  Stop twisting my arm!  I'll throw in the speakers.
Look, kids, why don't you just have your parents come i n and get a loan?  Then they could give you the money.
(building from a slow burn) With all due respect, Jack and Diane Bartlett... They exchange a smile, first time saying this.

...do not accept charity.  We are two young, able-bodied Americans.  We do not want a handout.  We want a hand-up.  Give us food and we will be hungry tomorrow.  Give us corn - the kind you plant, not eat - and we'll grow our own food and... and, uh, then cut it, and - uh, y'know eat it!  Now, if you're interested in giving us a home loan, I will sit back down.  If not, have a nice day, Ma'am.
Sorry.  My hands are tied. Diane makes a dramatic exit, taking a handful of M&M's fr her desk.  The squad, (previously unidentified) lounging the central bank of couches, follows her.
(watching proudly)
A smiling Jack and Diane as they look lovingly into each other's eyes.
Well... it's a little more than we wanted to spend, but we'll take it! They kiss.  PULL BACK to REVEAL we're:
It's a semi-furnished shit-hole.  The ONLY WINDOW looks o on a BRICK WALL.  The APARTMENT MANAGER, a grungy, Tommy type, paces.

Fine.  Just remember, I manage the building.  I don't, like, own it or fix it.  So, like, I don't care if shit breaks.  All I care is that the rent is shoved under my door on the first.  Oh, and if there's, like, packages outside my door?  Leave 'em the hell alone. He exits.  Jack and Diane are not listening - lost in eac others' eyes.
Jack, in uniform, stands behind the counter.
(stilted) Welcome to Burger Bin. (sotto) Don't get the Filet-O-Fish - the fry cook picks his ass.
An ANGRY COOK standing behind Jack.
Jack, in uniform, behind the counter.  He looks confused he presses buttons on his high-tech register.
(accenting Spanish words) Two Taco Grannnndes, one burrrrrrito, large ta-co chips and guacamooooooole...
Jack stands at the counter - in uniform.
(sotto to customer) We don't really have fried rats in the buckets - I know, I checked.
PULL BACK to reveal a long line waiting.
(looking up from register) That'll be...uh, thirty five cents, please.
Jack stands at the counter, in sailor uniform.  An OLD NA MAN, all in white, stands in the B.G. cleaning his nails a knife.
(nervous, looks over shoulder) Welcome to Dinkie's Donuts.
A hurt and angry Jack walks in, still in sailor uniform.  Diane's in bed eating and doing homework.
Dinkie is a bad, bad man...
Jack stands in front of the counter, THREE SOCIAL RETARDS (Jack's age) behind it.  Jack hands them his application.

(defeated) Y'know what?  I'll save you the time.  I'm not going to lie.  I don't believe in it.  If you pick your ass - I'm going to tell people.  I have no idea how to run your registers.  And, if any of you are hard core drinkers and like to throw knives, well, I'm outta here right now.
Uh, are, uh, you-you're Jack Bartlett, right?
Yeah.
You'd be, like, hangin' out with us every night after school, right?
Yeah - well, after football practice.
(savoring the words) Football practice - fantasmic. The social retards look at each other, excited.
You're hired!

MUZAK UP.  A worried Diane, now showing slightly under al black warm-ups, is writing on her notepad as she walks do an aisle.  Suddenly, in the B.G. CROSS AISLE, an ecstatic Jack, in "Video Barn" uniform, WHIZZES PAST, riding his c Arms out at his sides.
I'm on top of the world! Seeing Diane, he tries to stop, but can't and continues p A SECOND LATER, he scrambles back and rides up to her - tossing more boxes into the already FULL CART.
